analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/41/0xd67a6cd797a8fdc77b12335d7dacdfd14ea7c7fd.sol:
	Contract myfichain has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/41/0xd67a6cd797a8fdc77b12335d7dacdfd14ea7c7fd.sol#175-176)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/41/0xd67a6cd797a8fdc77b12335d7dacdfd14ea7c7fd.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/41/0xd67a6cd797a8fdc77b12335d7dacdfd14ea7c7fd.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/41/0xd67a6cd797a8fdc77b12335d7dacdfd14ea7c7fd.sol#53-54) is not in mixedCase
